Please login. import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { TokenStorageService } from '../_services/token-storage.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'] }) export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit { currentUser: any; constructor(private token: TokenStorageService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.currentUser = this.token.getUser(); } }
